description: This Python script demonstrates how to use the ThinkingTools component within an agent framework to capture and print reasoning content in both streaming and non-streaming modes. It creates agents, configures them with instructions, runs responses, and accesses reasoning content from the agent's response object.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with language models and tools.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and print a response from the agent, supporting streaming and non-streaming modes.
